section.section: This subsection does not limit the right of an individual to provide for distribution of property by will.

Except as provided in § 2-123 of the Real Property Article, after a juvenile court enters an order for adoption under this Part III of this subtitle:
the adoptee:
each of the adoptee's living parents is:
the Estates and Trusts Article shall govern all of the rights of inheritance between the adoptee and parental relatives.

text.section: An order for adoption under this Part III of this subtitle terminates all pending CINA cases as to the adoptee.
Adoption of an adult has the same legal effect as adoption of a minor.

section.section: Service on a parent under this subsection shall be at the parent's last address known to the juvenile court.
